Sta Resource

Setting
Library Userdefined
Library OperatingSystem
Library String
Library Userdefined #Resource log_resource.html
Library Selenium2Library
Library killChromeDriver
Variables
Keyword
Go To RF Set Sub Page [Arguments] @{list}
${list}= set variable @{list}
Go To Nav Page @{list}
Log ****** 跳转到无线设置子页面 （Go To RF Set Sub Page）******
${len}= Get Length ${list}
${menu}= set variable @{list}[0]
${nav}= set variable @{list}[1]
Comment ${css_submenu2}= set variable ${space}
Comment ${submenu2}= Run keyword IF ${len} == 4
... set variable @{list}[3]
... ELSE set variable ${space}
# menu:nav:submenu:submenu1
${css_menu}= Run keyword IF "${menu}"=="无线设置" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(4) > input
${css_nav}= Run keyword IF "${nav}"=="无线接入服务" set variable
... css=#menu_wi_service
comment 无线设置:无线接入服务
sleep 4
Focus ${css_nav}
Click Element ${css_nav}
Go To Nav Page [Arguments] @{list}
Log *********跳转主页面*********
${menu}= set variable @{list}[0]
${css_menu}= Run keyword if "${menu}"=="无线设置" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(4) > input
... ELSE IF "${menu}"=="网络设置" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(3) > input
... ELSE IF "${menu}"=="设备管理" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(5) > input
... ELSE IF "${menu}"=="系统状态" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(2) > input
... ELSE IF "${menu}"=="配置向导" set variable
... css=#menu > div:nth-child(1) > input
sleep 1
${status}= Run Keyword and Return Status ClickElement ${css_menu}
Sleep 1.5
Run Keyword If ${status}==False unselect Frame
ClickElement ${css_menu}
Sleep 1.5
Recover Chrome Close Process chromedriver
Update Wireless Service [Arguments] &{dic}
Log ******** 修改无线服务 ********
&{wireless_dic}= create Dictionary ssid_name="CommSky_2.4G" radio_bind="2.4G"
... enableservice="unckeck"
${ssid_name}= set variable ${dic.ssid_name}
${wifi_frequency}= set variable ${dic.wifi_frequency}
select frame Frame_Content
sleep 1
Wait Until Element is visible css=#list_table > table > tbody > tr.odd > td.opBtn0 > input[type="button"]
Run Keyword IF "${wifi_frequency}"=="2.4G" Focus css=#list_table > table > tbody > tr.odd > td.opBtn0 > input[type="button"]
Run Keyword IF "${wifi_frequency}"=="2.4G" Click Button css=#list_table > table > tbody > tr.odd > td.opBtn0 > input[type="button"]
Input Text css=#text_ssid ${ssid_name}
sleep 1
Focus css=body > div.content_option > input:nth-child(2)
Click Button css=body > div.content_option > input:nth-child(2)
sleep 3
Clean Chrome Driver Run killChrome.bat
